meanings.definition: A plant of the parsley family with spiny leaves and small white or purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: The eryngium in the garden has sharp leaves and pretty flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw an eryngium plant with purple flowers in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The spiky eryngium plant poked me when I tried to touch it.
meanings.sent4: The eryngium stood out in the garden like a beautiful, spiky jewel.
meanings.sent5: The small eryngium flowers added a touch of elegance to the garden.

meanings.definition: The dried roots of this plant used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: Herbalists often use eryngium roots in their remedies.
meanings.sent2: The dried eryngium roots have a strong, earthy smell.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the eryngium roots for regular spices in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The power of eryngium roots in herbal medicine is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The ancient healers believed in the magical properties of eryngium roots.
